title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H2 - Nov 13 2021
itunes:title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H2 - Nov 13 2021
description:
The battle over forced vaccination of children begins. The worst mayor in America asks: What is freedom? And Buck points out: In a truly "Orwellian" way, ousted de Blasio is incredibly implying that unfreedom is freedom! Transportation Secretary Mayor Pete -- who Clay names as least-qualified cabinet-level bureaucrat ever -- really thinks the roads are racist. Delusional Obama peddles lies at climate conference. Clay reads us an article that handily disputes him.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
